title: Welcome to 1754 wylie st unit
description:
Welcome to 1754 wylie st unit a! This immaculate, brand-new condo with parking is located in the desirable francisville/ fairmount neighborhood. Take in the beauty of the clean, white brick exterior before walking through your own private entrance into this stunning, bi-level condo with white oak wood flooring that flows through the open floor plan. Modern kitchen features white quartz countertops and backsplash, soft close cabinetry, and stainless-steel appliances! The floor to ceiling windows offer an abundance of natural light that will make these 10 ft ceilings feel even more spacious! Head downstairs to find your primary bedroom with en-suite bathroom featuring black delta finishes, white vanity, and rain head faucet in the tiled walk-in shower! Down the hallway, you will find a guest bathroom featuring a shower/tub combo just before your modern guest bedroom complete with a spacious closet with custom built-ins. This condo also features an in-unit, full size washer and dryer for your convenience. The sonos speakers built into the ceiling, along with the keyless entry system, round out the luxury finishes in this condo! Enjoy this prime location being just a stone’s throw away from all of the popular fairmount hot spots, including bar hygge, tela’s, fare, bold coffee bar, whole foods, the spring gardens, aldi and more! Reach out today to schedule your tour!
1754 wylie st #a,

title: Welcome to unit 3-r!
description:

Then stroll down the corridor to your 2 nicely sized bedrooms with the renovated bathroom in between. 2021 spring garden has central air in each unit, over-sized windows, basement laundry and an address that places you on one of the best locations of this vibrant neighborhood. title: This 3 bed 3 bath apt has our hearts! Tour today!
description:
3108 Clifford St #1 – Luxury 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt with parking space!
Gorgeous luxury 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt in Brewerytown area, just a block from Fairmount Park is the perfect place to create new memories! This brand new first and sub level unit atop wonderful hardwood flooring is a one half of a 2 unit modern architectural space, curated with an eclectic mixture of contemporary fixtures amidst a ton of amenities for a higher quality of living. Now imagine you live here! The perfect spot to explore the city on foot, bicycle, or however, you choose.
The first bedroom (10’7″ x 9’6″) sits at the front part of the main level and while big windows are obvious at first sight, ample closet space are one of its best assets! A full bathroom with a stand up shower also sits on the main level. Discover an extravagant kitchen with quartz countertops, sleek white cabinetry, a breakfast bar and stainless-steel appliances including: a refrigerator, microwave, gas stove, dishwasher–which create an ideal setting for meal preparation. The kitchen and living room area make up a bright and open concept floorplan and just off the living room a back entrance/exit which leads out to the driveway wherein your own parking space exists to relieve the parking woes we the citizens of Philadelphia have had bestowed upon us.
The sublevel includes 2 bedrooms (1 bedroom with an ensuite bathroom) located on opposite ends, closet space, a slate tiled bathroom with a large stand up shower, a stacked washer/dryer atop hardwood flooring. 2nd bedroom (12’4”x11’8”) located on the front part of the sublevel, includes closet space. 3rd bedroom (12’3”x12’4”) located in the rear of the sublevel as an ensuite bathroom with a tiled stand up shower, as well as, tons of sunlight.

title: Renovated and Charming 4 bedroom, 2 bath  Cape Style home!!!
description: E Huntingdon St, Welcome to 2038 E Huntingdon! This spacious East Kensington home beautifully blends form and function, filled with custom fine woodwork and artistic details in an abundance of space. As you approach this 3-story rowhome your eye will be immediately drawn to the flower boxes and custom planter with bench out front. The first level has an open floorplan, smoothly flowing from living room to dining room to kitchen, all with great natural light. Built-in shelves allow for functional and attractive storage for books, plants or your favorite treasures. In the kitchen, additional custom built-in shelving over the ample counter space smartly allows for more attractive and accessible storage without sacrificing the natural light from the large kitchen window. You can grill, entertain and dine al fresco with ease as you pass through the kitchen back door to a covered deck and spacious back yard, ready for any and all outdoor activities you desire.  Back inside, head upstairs past the lovely hand-painted mural and fine handcrafted balusters to the 2nd level which houses 2 bedrooms, a full hall bathroom and hall closet. The rear bedroom with new hardwood flooring was most recently used as a textiles studio but can easily be used as a regular bedroom, office, nursery or guest room. The renovated hall bath has clever custom built-in storage for easily accessible but well-hidden extra necessities as well as handsome and unique fixtures. Pass the hall closet to the spacious front bedroom with double wide closet and dressing area. From there, head up to the 3rd level to find an additional small room that would be perfect for an office or nursey, a half bath and another full bedroom with double wide closet.  With this charming house you can have the often-elusive combination of a big yard without sacrificing all the perks of city living. It’s an easy walk to the Kensington Co-op, coffee shops, restaurants and public trans while also being close to I-95 for driving convenience. Schedule a tour today  show contact info

title: Beautiful Two Bedroom Two Bathroom Apartment Home, Washer and Dryer
description:
The home at 1702 is a 1,180 square foot Da Vinci two bedroom two bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This home on the 17th floor has windows that face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a city view looking down Walnut Street and skyscrapers to the left. The beautiful kitchen and bathrooms are definitely a must see! There is also abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Experience the convenience of having a combination washer and dryer inside your new home! Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Paper Source, L'Occitane, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, a.bar, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Marathon Grill, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Alice Pizza. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of artisanal bread from Metropolitan Bakery.
Community Features:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Package room
* Bike storage
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* 17th floor apartment home
* Combination washer and dryer
* Spacious closets
* Large east-facing windows
* City view
* Wood floors
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Beautiful bathrooms with Italian tile
* Spacious home at 1,180 square feet
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Please make an appointment to tour with Resmate, our robot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. You may choose to tour in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com for the most up-to-date availability!
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!

title: Now available for rent!
description:
Now available for rent! 2012 poplar is indeed a coveted rarity with over 3,000 square feet of light-filled, gracious living space, in the heart of a thriving art museum neighborhood. A free-standing home with a stately presence, this four bedroom, 4.5 bath gem boasts expansively-proportioned rooms, high ceilings, and open-concept city living at its finest. The main live space is warm and comfortable, with striking hardwood floors, elegant crown molding, recessed lighting, and a peak through to the lush green from the stunning garden at the rear of the home. The european-style kitchen is absolutely the focal point of the first floor. Custom cabinetry, classic white marble countertops, stainless appliances including a beautiful aga range, farmhouse sink, convenient breakfast bar, and statement pendant lighting. The spacious dining room boasts gorgeous views of the garden, a private, fully enclosed oasis of lush landscaping and year round enjoyment. A convenient powder room completes the first floor of this lovely home. Upstairs, a large and light-filled owner's suite sits at the front of floor two, which boasts the same striking hardwood flooring. Plentiful closets and an elegant marble bath with dual sink and oversized shower. A second spacious bedroom and full bath complete this floor. 2012 offers unique flexibility, as floor three of the home boasts a third expansive bedroom which might also be an owner's suite. A fourth classic bedroom and a full bath, and those gorgeous hardwood floors complete the third floor. Up a quick flight to sweeping panoramic city skyline views and tremendous open-air entertainment space from the fabulous rooftop deck. Expanding the home's value exponentially, the lower level is completely and beautifully finished, replete with a higher ceiling, comfortable living area, spacious bedroom and full bath, excellent storage, and laundry. And yes, those stunning hardwood floors! Simply an exceptional, loved property in every way, in a walkable neighborhood surrounded by art and culture, fine and casual dining, shopping, easy access to transportation, the schuylkill river trail, fairmount park, and so much more. A unique opportunity for a very special home.

The foyer leads to a generously sized living room with two walls of floor-to-ceiling windows. The gourmet kitchen overlooks the open floor plan which features a dining area and spacious living room. The master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows is a nice size with a walk-in closet and an additional bonus wall closet. Attached to the master bedroom you will find its own bathroom with a soaking tub. The second bedroom is off of the living area with yet another great size wall closet. The hall bathroom is a full bath with a stall shower. For convenience, there is a stacked washer and dryer in the private laundry room. Throughout this unit, you have thought out custom california closets, updated appliances, two new hvac units, new water heater, high-end window treatments, and extra cabinets that the sellers added for even more storage in the master bedroom. The lobby and gym is under major renovation, but do not worry as the seller has already taken care of the assessment that each unit owes. Great amenities include 24/7 doormen, separate storage space plus onsite parking. This condominium building is located on historic washington square park, with tons of restaurants, shopping, museums, public transportation and so much more. A must-see rarity for sure! All utilities are included in the rent price! No pets.
